rows.label: qst104904_msg0001
rows.name:
Your incandescent face is like the
rays of the sun... The room is
brightened by your very presence!

rows.label: qst104904_msg0002
rows.name:
...Forgive me. I must try to compose
myself.

rows.label: qst104904_msg0003
rows.name:
Your reward for fetching me the ice
flowers, yes? How could I forget?

rows.label: qst104904_msg0004
rows.name:
Would you...perhaps grace me with
one last, itty-bitty request?

rows.label: qst104904_msg0005
rows.name:
You recall how I'm writing a book
about beautiful flowers?

rows.label: qst104904_msg0006
rows.name:
I was thinking I would combine them
with some beautiful scenery and that
would be that.

rows.label: qst104904_msg0007
rows.name:
But that would be an affront to true
beauty!

rows.label: qst104904_msg0008
rows.name:
No, to capture that moment of the
sublime, I need a truly breathtaking
spectacle!

rows.label: qst104904_msg0009
rows.name:
And none but you could make that
dream, that fleeting vision a reality!
I need you! Will you help me?

rows.label: qst104904_msg0010
rows.name:
From the bottom of my heart, thank
you! Thank you.

rows.label: qst104904_msg0011
rows.name:
Then, may I ask you to rid us of the
Jairo Griffox near the Lumos Pedestal?

rows.label: qst104904_msg0012
rows.name:
A handsome warrior in a dreamlike
snowscape, fighting elegant beasts...
Tell me every detail.

rows.label: qst104904_msg0101
rows.name:
Er, ah... Would you mind if I could talk
to one of the handsome gentlemen in
your party?
